help:
Displays available commands and basic usage:
- /backup — Create a backup ZIP file of the current guild (roles, channels, categories, permission overwrites, emojis, stickers, webhooks, invites, scheduled events, bans). The command replies with the saved filename and stores the archive in `backups/`.
- /restore <filename> — Restore a previously created backup into the current guild. Provide the exact filename shown when the backup was saved.
- /reset — Apply or recreate guild defaults, and optionally delete existing content (Administrator permission required).
- /help — Display this help message.

Notes: Scheduled daily backups may run at 09:00 UTC (04:00 EST) if enabled in the configuration. Check the bot logs for progress, errors and the exact saved filename when a backup completes.
